SELECT c.id, c.status, c.ORDER, c.TENDER_ID, c.REPAY_TIME, c.REPAY_YESTIME, c.REPAY_ACCOUNT, c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT + c.REPAY_YESEXTRAINTEREST AS REPAY_YESACCOUNT, c.INTEREST,
CASE WHEN fc.ID is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS HAS_EXTRA_INTEREST,
CASE WHEN c.REPAY_YESEXTRAINTEREST > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS HAS_EXTRA_INTEREST,
fc.APR_YEAR AS APR_YEAR, c.CAPITAL, c.LATE_DAYS, c.LATE_INTEREST, c.ADDTIME, c.ADDIP, c.ADVANCETIME, c.FIRST_BORROW_ID, c.IS_FIRST_BORROW, c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID, c.IS_CUSTODY, t.ADDTIME AS tenderTime, t.PARENT_ID AS parentId, b.order AS borrowOrder, b.APR AS borrowApr, b.TIME_LIMIT AS borrowTimeLimit, b.ID AS borrowId, b.NAME AS borrowName, b.ID AS cborrowId, b.status AS borrowStatus, b.borrowType AS borrowType, b.STYLE AS borrowStyle, b.TIME_LIMIT AS borrowTimeLimit, r.WEBSTATUS AS repaymentWebStatus, r.status AS repaymentStatus, r.id AS repaymentWebid, t.IS_VIP AS vipApp_passed, f.PERIODS AS first_periods, b.credit_rating AS creditRating, rm.USERNAME, CASE WHEN c.`STATUS` = 1 OR c.`STATUS` = 2 OR c.`STATUS` = 3 THEN ROUND(c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT-c.CAPITAL+c.REPAY_YESEXTRAINTEREST,2) ELSE 0 END as yesInterest, CASE WHEN c.`STATUS` = 1 OR c.`STATUS` = 2 OR c.`STATUS` = 3 THEN CASE WHEN b.BORROWTYPE = 3 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT-c.CAPITAL+c.REPAY_YESEXTRAINTEREST)*t.RATIO,2) END ELSE 0 END as inverestFee, ROUND(c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT - (CASE WHEN c.`STATUS` = 1 OR c.`STATUS` = 2 OR c.`STATUS` = 3 THEN CASE WHEN b.BORROWTYPE = 3 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT-c.CAPITAL+c.REPAY_YESEXTRAINTEREST)*t.RATIO,2) END ELSE 0 END),2) as getYesAccount, t.TENDER_TYPE FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c LEFT JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord t ON t.id = c.TENDER_ID LEFT JOIN rocky_borrow b ON b.id = t.borrow_id LEFT JOIN rocky_member rm ON b.USER_ID = rm.id LEFT JOIN t_first_borrow f ON f.id = c.FIRST_BORROW_ID LEFT JOIN rocky_b_repaymentrecord r ON r.borrow_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_float_coupon fc ON c.TENDER_ID = fc.TARGET_ID and c.USER_ID = fc.USER_ID and fc.TYPE = 1 and fc.TARGET_TYPE = 1
and fc.STATUS = 1
and fc.IS_CUSTODY != 1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND c.ORDER = r.ORDER ORDER BY c.REPAY_YESTIME DESC,c.REPAY_TIME ASC
